H0.text: How much DNA is stored is directly impacted by the process of gene regulation.

H1.text: How much DNA is replicated is directly impacted by the process of gene regulation.

H2.text: Which mRNA is produced is directly impacted by the process of gene regulation.

H3.text: Which tRNA is produced is directly impacted by the process of gene regulation.

A4.text: ChIPBase decodes the transcriptional regulatory networks of non-coding RNAs and protein-coding genes from ChIP-seq data.
